hero.title: Natural wellness and energy in one bottle
hero.subtitle: Rich in probiotics, vitamins, and minerals – it empowers you and nourishes your body!

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Henka is a Georgian brand that crafts premium-quality kombucha and functional waters. Our natural and delicious products support immune health, restore energy, and maintain balance. Kombucha is rich in probiotics, while functional water provides vitamin D for overall well-being.
